main event: A UFO sighting involving a bright yellow and white object was reported in Charlotte, North Carolina on August 3, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as round and brighter than stars or normal aircraft,The object was observed for about 2-3 seconds as it moved from directly overhead to the eastern horizon,The observer thought the object resembled a half dollar held at arm's length,Multiple conclusions were drawn regarding the object being possibly a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon,The investigation into the report started 1.5 months after the sighting due to delayed information.
sighted object: a round yellow and white object
